Blog

It has been over nine months since I bought my Kata 3N1-33 Sling Backpack so lets take a look at the bag and how it's held up through daily usage so far...

Initially I made the purchase because I need to carry a laptop every day for work and am still in the thick of my Photo 365 Challenge. The main compartment of the bag is comprised of a number of velcro sided dividers that can be configured to fit whatever gear you may have.... (read more...)

Music

Borrow Lenses

Chicago

I am a photographer and web-developer from Chicago, IL. Specializing in landscape and nature photography, I also love shooting portraits, band promos, and concert photography whenever I get the chance. I have been lucky enough to shoot in Chicago, New York, Tokyo, London, and more. Gorilla-Studios is a place for me to showcase my growing portfolio while offering advice and support to photographers no matter what their skill level.
